subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish dominated the sprint finish of the sixth stage of the Giro d’Italia for his second victory in this month’s race, while Luca Paolini’s overall lead remained unchanged.
snippet: Mark Cavendish dominated the sprint finish of the sixth stage of the Giro d’Italia for his second victory in this month’s race, while Luca Paolini’s overall lead remained unchanged.
